flake8-annotations.option:
Type: Flake8AnnotationsOptions/null
Status: DEPRECATED

Available Sub-options:
  - allow-star-arg-any: Whether to suppress `ANN401` for dynamically typed `*args` and
  - ignore-fully-untyped: Whether to suppress `ANN*` rules for any declaration
  - mypy-init-return: Whether to allow the omission of a return type hint for `__init__` if at
  - suppress-dummy-args: Whether to suppress `ANN000`-level violations for arguments matching the
  - suppress-none-returning: Whether to suppress `ANN200`-level violations for functions that meet
